requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750(2GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon Pro 460 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960(4GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon Pro 570 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X / Intel Core i7-7600K
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 Super 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended, The game has a variety of visual effects that may cause seizures please stop playing if such symptoms occur.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (untested on Windows 7, 8, and 11 but ya know, it probably works)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 (you probably can't run this on your momma's generic laptop)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yeah probably have one of these
  • Additional Notes: Look, I'll level with you, I'm a solo dev with limited experience in optimization using a resource-hungry engine so you're going to need a mid-tier gaming computer if you want to keep up a good fps and visual fidelity.
